app.title: Subtitle Flow
app.description: Synchronize and edit subtitles for your media files.
footer.copyright:
© 2025 <0>Subtitle Flow project. Subtitle Flow is an innovative, browser-based subtitle editor designed for creators and professionals, offering a seamless experience for creating, editing, and synchronizing subtitles with unparalleled ease and efficiency, directly within your web browser.

The original concept for this powerful subtitle tool was conceived by <1>Amin Sharifi (moaminsharifi). The application's development was significantly accelerated and enhanced with the assistance of Firebase Studio, an AI-powered collaborative coding partner, enabling rapid prototyping and feature implementation.

Built with Next.js for a modern frontend experience, Subtitle Flow integrates advanced AI capabilities for transcription and (soon) translation, utilizing a range of powerful models to provide users with cutting-edge tools.

This privacy-focused application ensures all your data and API keys remain local to your browser. Subtitle Flow is a testament to collaborative innovation, aiming to deliver a comprehensive and free subtitle editing solution for everyone.
footer.features.title: Key Features

footer.features.list.title: Multi-Format Support
footer.features.list.description: Import/export SRT, VTT, and other common subtitle formats with ease.

footer.features.list.title: AI Transcription (Full)
footer.features.list.description: Auto-generate timestamped subtitles using Google AI, OpenAI, Groq, or AvalAI in 60+ languages (Option 2).

footer.features.list.title: Multi-Process AI Transcription
footer.features.list.description: Advanced 2-stage AI: Full timestamped transcription, then parallel segment-by-segment text refinement (Option 3).

footer.features.list.title: Intuitive Editor
footer.features.list.description: Precisely edit timings and text with a user-friendly interface and media preview.

footer.features.list.title: Privacy First
footer.features.list.description: All processing happens in your browser. Your files and API keys stay local.

footer.features.list.title: Offline Capable
footer.features.list.description: Core editing features work offline, so you can edit anywhere, anytime.

footer.features.list.title: Multi-Language UI
footer.features.list.description: Switch between supported user interface languages for a native experience.

footer.features.list.title: One-Click Translation (Coming Soon)
footer.features.list.description: Translate subtitles from their original language to all supported languages with a single click.

footer.features.list.title: Expanded API Support (Coming Soon)
footer.features.list.description: Support for OpenRouter and Gemini API, expanding your choices for AI-powered features.

footer.features.list.title: Ask a Feature
footer.features.list.description: Have an idea for a new feature? Let us know on GitHub!

settings.title: Application Settings
settings.description: Manage your API tokens, theme, language, and other preferences here.
settings.theme.label: Theme
settings.timestampTaskConfig.label: Timestamp Transcription Configuration (e.g., Whisper)
settings.cueSliceTaskConfig.label: Cue/Slice Transcription Configuration (e.g., Gemini, GPT, Llama)
settings.apiKeyManagement.label: API Key Management
settings.apiConfig.advancedOptions.tempe: Controls randomness. Lower for more deterministic, higher for more creative. Range: 0.0 - 2.0.
settings.apiConfig.advancedOptions.maxSe: Max Segment Duration for Full Transcription (sec)
Maximum transcription segment duration in seconds for full media transcription
Duration (4-360s) for each audio chunk sent for full transcription. Shorter may improve accuracy for noisy audio but increases API calls.
settings.credits.title: Credits & Acknowledgements
settings.credits.builtWith: This application is proudly built with:
settings.language.label: Application Language
settings.toast.savedDescription.v3: Preferences saved. Theme: {theme}, App Lang: {appLanguage}. Timestamp Task: {transcriptionProvider} ({transcriptionModel}). Cue/Slice Task: {llmProvider} ({llmModel}). Default AI Lang: {defaultLanguage}.
settings.toast.maxSegmentDurationValidat: Max Segment Duration must be between {min} and {max} seconds.
page.steps.upload: Step 1 of 3: Prepare Your Media & Subtitles
mediaUploader.title: Upload Media
mediaUploader.description: Select an audio or video file to get started.
mediaUploader.label: Media File (Audio/Video)
subtitleUploader.option1.title: Option 1: Upload Subtitle File
subtitleUploader.option1.description: Upload an existing .SRT or .VTT subtitle file.
subtitleUploader.label: Subtitle File (.srt, .vtt)
aiGenerator.option2.title: Option 2: Generate Full Transcription with AI
aiGenerator.option2.description: Let AI generate timestamped subtitles for the entire media file (uses Timestamp Task settings).
aiGenerator.option2.descriptionEnabled: This may take several minutes depending on provider and media length.
aiGenerator.option2.apiKeyNeededMessage: One or more API keys (OpenAI, AvalAI, or Groq) must be set in Settings to use this feature.
aiGenerator.language.label: Language for Full Transcription
aiGenerator.language.description: Uses the language selected here for this generation. Initial value from Settings.
multiProcess.option3.title: Option 3: Generate Subtitles with Multi-Processing
multiProcess.option3.descriptionEnabled: Two-stage process: Full timestamped transcription, then per-segment refinement. Uses settings for both Timestamp and Cue/Slice tasks.
multiProcess.status.stage2Init: Stage 2/2: Starting refinement of {count} segments with {model}...
multiProcess.status.complete: Multi-process transcription complete! New track "{trackName}" added with {count} cues.
multiProcess.error.noInitialSegments: Multi-Process Error: Stage 1 did not produce any initial segments.
page.nextStep.title: Next Step
page.nextStep.description: Once your media is loaded and you've either uploaded or generated subtitles, proceed to the editor.

cheatsheet.title: Keyboard Cheatsheet & Tips
cheatsheet.description: Quick guide for using Subtitle Flow with your keyboard and other helpful tips.
cheatsheet.generalNav.title: General Navigation
cheatsheet.generalNav.tab: <0>Tab</0>: Move to the next interactive element.
cheatsheet.generalNav.shiftTab: <0>Shift</0> + <1>Tab</1>: Move to the previous interactive element.
cheatsheet.generalNav.enterSpace: <0>Enter</0> / <1>Space</1>: Activate focused buttons or select items in a dropdown.
cheatsheet.uploadStep.title: Upload Step (Step 1)
cheatsheet.uploadStep.openDialog: Focus the "Media File" or "Subtitle File" input, then press <0>Enter</0> or <1>Space</1> to open the file selection dialog.
cheatsheet.uploadStep.activateButtons: Tab to "Generate Full Subtitles with AI" or "Proceed to Edit" buttons and press <0>Enter</0>.
cheatsheet.editStep.title: Edit Step (Step 2)
cheatsheet.editStep.mediaPlayer.title: Media Player:
cheatsheet.editStep.mediaPlayer.controls: Tab to player controls (Play/Pause, Rewind, Fast Forward, Volume, Subtitle Timing Shift). Activate with <0>Enter</0> or <1>Space</1>.
cheatsheet.editStep.mediaPlayer.sliders: Use <0>Arrow Keys</0> (Left/Right) when focus is on the progress or volume sliders.
cheatsheet.editStep.trackLang.title: Track & Language Selection:
cheatsheet.editStep.trackLang.openDropdo: Tab to the "Active Subtitle Track" or "Language for AI Cue Regeneration" select boxes.
cheatsheet.editStep.trackLang.activateDr: Press <0>Enter</0> or <1>Space</1> to open the dropdown.
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.title: Subtitle Editor:
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.addNew: Tab to "Add New" button and press <0>Enter</0>.
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.tabThrough: Tab through each subtitle entry's Start Time, End Time, Text Area, Regenerate Button, and Delete Button.
cheatsheet.editStep.editor.typeText: Type in the Text Area. <0>Enter</0> creates a new line.
cheatsheet.exportStep.title: Export Step (Step 3)
cheatsheet.exportStep.buttons: Tab to "Export as .SRT", "Export as .VTT", "Edit More", or "Start Over" buttons.
cheatsheet.tips.title: Tips
cheatsheet.tips.apiKey: Ensure your API keys are set in Settings for AI features.
cheatsheet.tips.fullTranscriptionLang: For full AI transcription, the language selected in the 'Generate Full Transcription with AI' section on the Upload page will be used (defaults to your setting).
cheatsheet.tips.segmentRegenLang: For AI cue regeneration in the editor, the language selected in the editor's dropdown is used (defaults to your setting).
cheatsheet.tips.debugLogs: Check the Debug Logs (scroll icon) for detailed process information.
debugLog.title: Debug Logs
debugLog.description: Recent application activity and diagnostic messages. Newest logs are shown first.
